title: Getting started with the Help-Center AI
text: To get started, connect your workspace, upload your knowledge base documents, and configure tone preferences under Workspace Settings.

title: Configuring Gemini access
text: Set the GEMINI_API_KEY environment variable and optionally override GEMINI_MODEL. Enable JSON mode in askGemini by setting mode to 'json'.

title: Citations and compliance
text: Every answer must include inline numeric citations for all claims and a Sources section that maps numbers to document URLs.
